{{Infobox military award |awarded_by = {{flag|Russian Federation}} [[Ministry of Defence (Russia)|Ministry of Defence]] |caption = Army General Margelov Medal (obverse) |caption2 = Ribbon of the Army General Margelov Medal|eligibility = Military and civilian personnel of the [[Armed Forces of Russia]] |established = 6 May 2005 |for = see Statue of Awarding |higher = [[Army General Khrulev Medal]] |lower = [[Major General Alexander Alexandrov Medal]] |image = [[File:Medal Army General Margelov MoD RF.jpg|200px]] |image2 = [[File:General Margelov rib.png|80px]] |type = Departmental Award }} The '''Army General Margelov Medal''' ({{lang-ru|''Медаль Генерал Армии Маргелов''}}) is an award of the [[Ministry of Defence (Russia)|Ministry of Defence]] of the [[Russian Federation]] established by Order No. 182 of the Minister of Defence of the Russian Federation of 6 May 2005.<ref name=":0">{{Cite web|url=http://history.milportal.ru/arxiv/voenno-istoricheskij-zhurnal-2008-g/voenno-istoricheskij-zhurnal-9-2008-g/|title=«Военно-исторический журнал» — №9 — 2008 г|website=history.milportal.ru|publisher=Russian Federation Ministry of Defense|accessdate=2015-10-10}}</ref><ref name=":1">{{Cite web|url=//www.mil.ru/849/12215/12346/12394/12780/index.shtml|title=Медаль "Генерал армии Маргелов"|date=2007-05-26|publisher=Russian Federation Ministry of Defense|language=Russian|trans-title=Medal "Army General Margelov"|accessdate=2015-10-10|deadurl=yes|archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20070526065004/www.mil.ru/849/12215/12346/12394/12780/index.shtml|archivedate=May 26, 2007}}</ref> It is named after the renowned past commander of [[Soviet Airborne Troops]] Army General [[Vasily Margelov]]. The medal is awarded to military and civilian personnel of the [[Russian Airborne Troops]] for good service.
== Award Statute == The Army General Margelov Medal is awarded to Russian military personnel serving in the [[Russian Airborne Troops|Airborne Troops]] (VDV) for good service of 15 years or more if previously awarded the Decoration "For Merit" of Airborne Troops. It is also awarded to civilian personnel of the VDV for good service of more than 20 years. The medal can be awarded to veterans of the VDV who are in the reserve or retired, and those who have served for more than 25 years. The medal can also be awarded to military and civilian personnel of the [[Russian Armed Forces]] for contributions to the development of the VDV.<ref>{{Cite web|title = Медаль "Генерал армии Маргелов" : Министерство обороны Российской Федерации|url = http://stat.heraldy.mil.ru/heraldry/badges/info.htm?id=10372752@morfAwards|website = stat.heraldy.mil.ru|accessdate = 2015-10-10}}</ref>
The Russian Federation Order of Precedence dictates that the medal is worn immediately after the [[Army General Khrulev Medal]].<ref name=":0" />
== Award Description == [[File:MargelrvB3.jpg|200px|thumb|Medal "Army General Margelov" (reverse)]] The [[Army General]] Margelov Medal is a 32 mm in diameter circular medal made of gilt metal. Its obverse bears a portrait of Vasily Margelov, with tanks and aircraft dropping paratroopers above the general. At the top, there is a relief inscription on two lines "Army General Margelov" ([[Russian language|Russian]]: "''Генерал армии МАРГЕЛОВ") .'' Under the inscription, there is a relief of three howitzers and three [[BMD-1|BMD]] infantry fighting vehicles.<ref name=":1" />
The reverse of the medal bears the emblem of the Airborne Troops in the centre, with the embossed inscription "Ministry of Defence" at the top of the medal. The text "Russian Federation" is inscribed at the bottom of the medal.<ref name=":1" />
The medal is suspended from a Russian pentagonal mount by a ring through the metal suspension loop. The mount is covered by an overlapping 24 mm wide silk [[Moiré pattern|moiré]] ribbon with the distinctive left half of Russian Defence Ministry awards consisting of a 2 mm black edge stripe and yellow to the centre, the right half is blue.<ref name=":1" />
